law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 268, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 474, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 265, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 273, sec. 1. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 1. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 115, sec. 1. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 1. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 2. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 2; and ch. 124, sec. 1. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1893d-10, 1954-2.
